title: My cursor, store, mini map are all too small
body: I have a Dell XPS 15 and Ive tried changing the resolution over and over but everything remains tiny. I have maxed the size on all of it but still nothing. If anyone knows anything that would help please let me know.

replies.body:
There may be something wrong in your configuration file on the server. I recommend we reset the file with the steps below.

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your installation directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

>Delete the folder named **CONFIG**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the match, then hop into another one to confirm the changes went through. Let me know if this resolved the issue.
It didnt work my cursor is still very small as is the chat and the the store :/
What resolution are you running in Windows and what are you running in-game? Resolutions over 1920x1080 have a history of causing UI scaling issues.

In that case, I'd like you to reach out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), where we'll be able to dive into some logs and find the exact cause of this issue. If you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will provide the specialist with a lot more context on this issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I have the same problem did u guys figure it out?
If the steps I provided at the top of the thread didn't resolve this for you, I recommend submitting a ticket with the steps I left in my last reply.
